posts.title: Creating Personal Blog Using Github + Hexo
posts.text: This is my first blog :) In this article, I record my process of creating a personal blog using Github and Hexo. My approach could be applied to create any websites, not just blog. I will also write down some of the problems I met with and the solutions I used during this process, which might be helpful for somebody who visits this website. ##Hexo ###What is Hexo?Hexo is a fast, simple and powerful blog framework. Click https://hexo.io/ to get more information ###Install HexoWe’ll use Hexo to help us create our personal website.
